edu.uic.cs.dmtm.apriori

Class OutputWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uic.cs.dmtm.apriori.OutputWriter

  • public class OutputWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a write(File, ArrayList) method to generate an output file of the frequent itemsets according to the required format.
    Author:
    Marco Mele, Massimo Piras

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(java.io.File outputFile,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.util.TreeSet<Itemset>> frequentItemsets)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Prints out the frequentItemsets on the outputFile with the required format. Frequent itemsets are printed with the items sorted as they are, comma separated, curly braces embraced. Itemsets are listed grouped by dimension, leaded by their support count; higher-than-1-level itemsets are followed by their tail count.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the File class referring the file to print on.
        frequentItemsets - an ArrayList of TreeSets of Itemsets.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
